Player - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
Player is a class that contains information of each player -nickname: player's name -position: player's turn during game -point: points acquired during game -goalPoint: points acquired from objective cards -playerColor: player's color -personalGoal: objective that each player has to realize in order to acquire points at the end of game -handCards define list of card in hand of player.
Player(String, Game, Color) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
